content: I am not able to access live information about the current crowd levels at any particular landmark in paris. however, in general, the best time to visit these popular landmarks is early in the morning, soon after they open. alternatively, you could also visit them during the late afternoon or early evening when the crowds tend to thin out. it is also worth noting that the eiffel tower and the louvre museum tend to be less crowded on weekdays than on weekends. nonetheless, if you to avoid the crowds, the best time to visit these famous landmarks is during the off-season, which is during the fall and winter months.
